p.b: For each day's reading question, write your name, section, table, and group number on the upper right hand corner of your answer and hand it in at the start of class that day

problem.p: 1. (a) Explain why the total force on a system of particles is only due to the sum of external forces. (b) Explain the difference between the concepts of impulse and work.
2. Under what conditions does the center of mass of a system of particles move with constant velocity?
